title: Exploring data - campsite exit time and children

content.question: (a) Consider the two histograms. (i) How many of the 60 sites had an exit time before 8:30 A.M.?

frqParts.text: (a) Consider the two histograms. (i) How many of the 60 sites had an exit time before 8:30 A.M.?
(ii) How many of the 60 sites had an exit time of 11:00 A.M. or later?
(b) Compare the distributions of the exit times for those without young children and those with young children.
(c) Based on the histograms, what is a reasonable estimate of the median exit time for the random sample of 60 sites? Explain your reasoning.

topic.text: 1.5: Representing a Quantitative Variable with Graphs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
